text:
AutoGravity | Automative FinTech | Irvine, CA | FULL-TIME ONSITE | Software Engineer (React)

Who We Are: https://www.autogravity.com/about

What We Offer:

- Competitive salary

- 100% paid health/vision/dental insurance for employee and eligible dependents

- Discretionary, unlimited PTO

- 401k w/ 6% match

- Company-provided MacBook Pro

- $5k educational reimbursement + $5k for a single domestic conference a year

Technologies You Will Use: React, Redux, Jest, Enzyme, Next, Emotion, Node, Webpack, Sass, Cypress, and Sentry.

Postings:

Senior - https://boards.greenhouse.io/autogravitycorporation/jobs/131...

Mid-Level - https://boards.greenhouse.io/autogravitycorporation/jobs/131...
